s.text: Wild type 5-HT 3AS mouse receptor cDNA was obtained from Dr. Michael White [ 20 ] . Mutant receptors were constructed using either the Quick Change Mutagenesis kit (Stratagene) or the Altered Sites Mutagenesis kit (Promega).

Wild type 5-HT 3AS mouse receptor cDNA was obtained from Dr. Michael White [ 20 ] . Mutant receptors were constructed using either the Quick Change Mutagenesis kit (Stratagene) or the Altered Sites Mutagenesis kit (Promega).
Cells were either used fresh or frozen at this step until needed.

Wild type 5-HT 3AS mouse receptor cDNA was obtained from Dr. Michael White [ 20 ] . Mutant receptors were constructed using either the Quick Change Mutagenesis kit (Stratagene) or the Altered Sites Mutagenesis kit (Promega).

K d values were determined by fitting the binding data to the following equation using Graphpad PRISM (San Diego CA): B = B max [L] n/ ([L] n+ K n), where B is bound ligand, B max is the maximum binding at equilibrium L is the free ligand concentration and n is the Hill coefficient.
